wikipedia_page.main: Lloyd Ashley Ellams (born 11 January 1991) is an English footballer who plays as a striker.

response: Chester's Centre of Excellence was officially closed down at the start of the 2009–2010 season, due to the club's relegation to the Conference National, although most players remained at the club, with several, such as James Owen, Jack Rea and Lloyd Ellams playing in the senior side in the club's final season.
